org.jetel.data

Class GetVal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.GetVal

  • public class GetVal
extends java.lang.Object
    Supporting "macros" for getting values of differend data fields.
    Note: methods which takes field's position within record as input parameter are much faster than those accepting field's name.
    Since:
    August 20, 2002

        public static final java.lang.Object getValueNVL(DataRecord record,
                           int fieldNo,
                           java.lang.Object defaultValue)
        Return field's value as Object (internal representation of the value). If record or field happens to be NULL, use provided defaultValue instead.
        Parameters:
        record - DataRecord
        fieldNo - index of data field
        defaultValue - value (Object) to be used if field's value is null or record is null
        Returns:
